Captain Mathias:
You will pass by a place called Gainak before you get to Raider's Crossroads. Flame Patrol Vice Captain Tuska is deployed there under orders from Kakai the Lord of Flame. However, because that place is so far away from Kakai, they exchange letters through a guard from the Town of Rune. But the guard has been injured, and their communications have been cut off. I'd like you to deliver this letter to Flame Patrol Vice Captain Tuska near Gainak.
